name: @microfox/klingai
title: Klingai API Integration
description: TypeScript SDK providing seamless integration with the Klingai API for diverse functionalities, including account and billing management, image and video generation, and virtual try-on capabilities.

readme_map.title: Klingai API Integration
readme_map.description: The full README for the Klingai API Integration

all_readmes.description: The `KlingaiSDK` class is the main entry point for all interactions with the Klingai API. It handles authentication and provides methods for accessing various AI-powered video and image generation features.
A factory function to create and initialize an instance of the KlingaiSDK. This is the recommended way to get started with the SDK.
This function retrieves detailed information about the user's Klingai account, including usage and credit status.
This function retrieves billing and subscription information for the user's Klingai account.
This function generates an image based on a descriptive text prompt. It allows for customization of the image's style.
This function generates a video based on a provided image URL. It allows for customization of the video's style and duration.
This function synchronizes the lip movements in a video with a provided audio track.
This function generates a video from a sequence of multiple image URLs. It allows for customization of the video's style and duration.
This function generates a video based on a descriptive text prompt. It allows for customization of the video's style and duration.
This function applies a specified visual effect to a video.
This function extends the duration of an existing video by generating additional frames.
This function performs a virtual try-on by overlaying a specified item onto a person in an image or video.

constructors.name: KlingaiSDK
constructors.description: Create a new Klingai API Integration client through which you can interact with the API

requiredKeys.description: Your API key for authenticating with the Klingai API. Obtain it from your Klingai account dashboard.

keyInstructions.setupInfo:
To use the Klingai SDK, you need to obtain an API key from Klingai. Follow these steps:

1. Sign up for a Klingai account at https://www.klingai.com (placeholder URL)
2. Navigate to the API section in your account dashboard
3. Generate a new API key

Once you have your API key, you can use it to initialize the SDK:

```typescript
import { createKlingaiSDK } from '@microfox/klingai';

const klingai = createKlingaiSDK({
  apiKey: 'your-api-key-here'
});
```

Alternatively, you can set the API key as an environment variable:

```
KLINGAI_API_KEY=your-api-key-here
```

The SDK will automatically use the environment variable if no API key is provided during initialization.

Note: The API base URL is https://api-singapore.klingai.com. This is automatically set in the SDK and doesn't need to be configured separately.

Important: Keep your API key secure and never share it publicly.
